wikipedia_page.main: Joseph A. Bennett (28 March 1968 – 15 April 2015) was an English television, film, and theatre actor.

response: Graham was married to actor Joseph A. Bennett from 2002 until he took his own life on 13 April 2015. On 5 February 2004 she gave birth to a daughter, Edie May, six weeks prematurely. On 3 March 2006, she gave birth to a second daughter at home named Cyd Betty.Julie Graham - Biography - IMDb
